response.original_title: The Art of Connection: Noda Cloud Wall's Story
response.overview: Made possible by Grubb Properties.  Go behind the scenes to chronicle the creation of a massive, community-driven mural located at Link Apartments NoDa 36th in Charlotte, North Carolina.  The film details the multi-year process, which began with a "wish campaign" where Palmisano collected over a thousand wishes from the community.  These wishes -- some joyful, some sad -- were then incorporated into the mural as a way to honor the full range of human emotion and ensure the community felt included in the rapid changes happening in NoDa.
